text: "What'd I Say" is a 1959 song by Ray Charles and is the title track to his fifth studio album What'd I Say). It was one of his first soul tracks and broke into mainstream pop music with this track. It has been covered by Jerry Lee Lewis, Cliff Richard and Elvis Presley as a B-side to his hit single Viva Las Vegas. ==References== Category:1959 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Jazz songs Category:Ray Charles songs Category:Jerry Lee Lewis songs Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:The Ronettes songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Eddie Cochran songs Category:Eric Clapton songs Category:Roy Orbison songs Category:The Crickets songs
title: What'd I Say
